item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, February 7, 2025 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Meta torrented & seeded 81.7 TB dataset containing copyrighted data (366 points | 213 comments)
2. Apple Ordered by UK to Create Global iCloud Encryption Backdoor (199 points | 78 comments)
3. Donald Knuth's 2024 Christmas Lecture: Strong and Weak Components [video] (226 points | 30 comments)
4. The King in Yellow (46 points | 18 comments)
5. Entity-Component-System Architecture in Kubernetes (3 points | discuss)
6. Asahi Linux Lead Developer Hector Martin Resigns from Linux Kernel (91 points | 47 comments)
7. Copilot stops working on code that contains hardcoded banned words from GitHub (167 points | 66 comments)
8. Easy 6502 (137 points | 17 comments)
9. InspectMind AI (YC W24) Is Hiring for AI in Construction ( | hide)
10. UK demands access to Apple users' encrypted data (41 points | 9 comments)
11. Estonia to disconnect from the Russian-run electricity network on Saturday (52 points | 13 comments)
12. Transformer – Spreadsheet (232 points | 17 comments)
13. Understanding Reasoning LLMs (332 points | 122 comments)
14. Shwe Kokko is accused of being a city built on scams (158 points | 52 comments)
15. Apple ordered to open encrypted user accounts globally to UK spying (50 points | 2 comments)
16. Whalesong patterns follow a universal law of human language, new research finds (24 points | discuss)
17. There's Math.random(), and then there's Math.random() (2015) (57 points | 28 comments)
18. Emil's Story as a Self-Taught AI Researcher (2020) (31 points | 1 comment)
19. Announcing the data.gov archive (298 points | 86 comments)
20. Robust autonomy emerges from self-play (96 points | 46 comments)
21. Experience the DeepSeek R1 Distilled 'Reasoning' Models on Ryzen AI and Radeon (36 points | 10 comments)
22. What was before the telephone bell? Pencils and Hammers (5 points | discuss)
23. Show HN: SQLite disk page explorer (240 points | 32 comments)
24. Frank Lloyd Wright's mile high skyscraper proposal (2021) (131 points | 118 comments)
25. Simulating water over terrain (340 points | 53 comments)
26. OpenLDK: A Java JIT compiler and runtime in Common Lisp (181 points | 56 comments)
27. Boeing reports Starliner losses of more than half a billion dollars in 2024 (36 points | 25 comments)
28. Kill the "user": Musings of a disillusioned technologist (86 points | 59 comments)
29. Steve Meretzky – Working with Douglas Adams on the Hitchhiker's Guide (136 points | 32 comments)
30. OpenAI cofounder John Schulman is joining Mira Murati's startup (22 points | 14 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, February 7, 2025 at 2:15 PM UTC
